data.text: Awurade behu Yakob mmɔbɔ;
Amanaman bɛfa wɔn
Na da a Awurade bɛma mo ɔhome afi amanehunu, ahoyeraw ne nkoasom dennen mu no,
mubedi Babiloniahene ho fɛw se:
Awurade abubu otirimɔdenfo no abaa mu,
nea abufuw mu no ɔde bobɔɔ wɔn
Nsase no nyinaa rehome wɔ asomdwoe mu;
Mpo, ɔpepaw nnua ne Lebanon sida
Awufo nna a ɛwɔ ase no rekeka ne ho
Wɔn nyinaa begye so,
Wo kɛseyɛ nyinaa wɔde aba ɔda mu,
Sɛnea wufi ɔsoro abɛhwe fam,
Wokaa no wo koma mu se,
Mɛforo atra omununkum atifi;
Nanso wɔde wo abɛto ɔda mu,
Wɔn a wuhu wo no hwɛ wo haw,
ɔbarima a ɔmaa wiase dan nweatam,
Amanaman ahemfo no nyinaa wɔadeda wɔn
Nanso wɔapam wo afi wo da mu
Wɔrensie wo nka wɔn ho,
Siesie faako a wobekunkum ne mmabarima
“Mɛsɔre atia wɔn,”
“Mɛdan no ayɛ faako a mpatu wɔ
Asafo Awurade aka ntam se,
Mɛsɛe Asiria pasaa wɔ mʼasase so;
Eyi ne nhyehyɛe a wɔayɛ ama wiase nyinaa;
Na sɛ Asafo Awurade ayɛ nʼadwene a hena na obesiw no kwan?
Saa adehu yi baa afe a ɔhene Ahas wui no:
Munnni ahurusi, mo Filistifo,
Ahiafo mu hiani benya didibea,
Twa adwo, kurow pon! Su teɛ mu kuropɔn!
Mmuae bɛn na wɔde bɛma
